title: Ottsuls Shepherd-Hooks Adjustable for Bird-Feeder Lantern Plant-Hook Garden-Stake - Plant Stand Hanger for Outdoor Flower Basket, Bird Feeder Hanger Weddings Decor

These adjustable hooks are not just for bird feeders and lanterns, they are perfect for hanging flower pots, solar lights, and so much more. Made from heavy-grade steel with a smooth black powder coating, these hooks are not only stylish but durable and rust-free.

With 5 base prongs for added stability, these hooks can withstand any weather conditions. The 2-part pole system allows for easy height adjustment, and the quick assembly with 4 ground stakes makes installation a breeze. When not in use, these hooks can be easily disassembled for convenient storage.
